boardgame.name: Daytona 500
boardgame.description: Six little plastic cars race around the big Daytona track. The track is three spaces wide except for a sweeping curve at either end. In the curves, the track narrows to two lanes. The outer lane is a passing lane, requiring twice as many movement points to use and in which a car may not end its turn. Movement points come from play of the special deck of cards. Selecting a card from your hand, you move each of the cars on the card the prescribed number of spaces, trying to position your own car or cars most advantageously while leaving your opponents blocked. Before each race, the six cars are auctioned off, and you bid for them based on the cards in your hand. Payout is based on where your car(s) finished in the race. Most money wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Suggested game length is three races (each race lasts about 20 minutes), enough to give the luck of the draw a chance to even out._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Auto Racing: Wolfgang Kramer card system

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: DAYTONA 500 1990 Milton Bradley. Complete with gameboard, 6 race cars, 48 cards, paper money, instructions. Shipping weight is 4 pounds. Game looks unplayed, so cards and all parts are in perfect condition, however the box bottom has some major splits and tears (but still holds together fine). This game is Out-of-Print.

Used, but very good condition. Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted.
Excellent condition copy of this out of print game; box and contents in excellent condition.
Box has wear and is dented on back of the box, white scuffing. Games is played couple of times. Shipping is 8.80$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional.

Worn, used copy: The box shows shelfwear, but is still intact. The cars are all present, but the stickers were never applied and are no longer included. The board is still in quite good condition. This game is complete. The cars are the version without stickers, and the board has the incised grid pattern on it. The board is in good shape, and the cars are in good shape. The box is still solid but with a paper coming up in one corner, some dishing, and lots of shelfwear. The full set of cards have some bends on them all pretty similar in their amount of damage. I wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t able to remember one card from another from the backs, but I also never tried. The picture below shows one card (left) with typical damage, and another (right) with the most damage. All cards are fully readable. This game is out of print. Shipping will be priority mail, probably around $8-10 to the US. Give me your zip code and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll give you an exact amount.

This copy is in nice condition and is guaranteed 100% complete. The box is in ok condition but has surface wear, some minor corner wear and a slightly concaved box bottom. The fully color instructions are included in great shape. All 6 little cars are included in very good condition but some of the stickers are starting to peel a little. Huge game board is in good condition but is slightly warped (which is common for this game). Contains ALL 48 cards in great condition. Money is included (Milton Bradley money of course). U.S. buyers can pay with Google Checkout, Paypal, money orders or checks. Shipping is $9. International buyers must use Google Checkout or Paypal. Shipping depends on location.

Excellent condition. Extremely minor crease on back by corner, minor bowing of box side (i.e. it sticks out about 5 mm from side of bottom), minor 1 mm ding on side by corner. (Really not much. This box looks great.) Includes 5 (perhaps 6 I do not remember) really nice metal miniature cars. Paypal adds 4%. I am not opposed to outside US purchases, BUT purchases outside the USA must contact me directly before purchase so that we can discuss feasibility. It is a large flat game, so may be expensive to ship outside the USA.
The box is intact but is worn. The game parts are all there and the board is in very good condition.
